title: Henrietta, There's No One Better
description: Judy Moody, Clarice Bean, and Junie B. Jones have a new best friend. Introducing Henrietta!Henrietta has a habit of making things up.Some things are Henrietta has a baby brother the size of a sock (almost), a crazy brown dog named Madge, and a constant hunger for chocolate ripple cake. She is good at explorification and making her dad's undies into a superb hat. Other things are not Henrietta says she can keep a secret. She cannot.But if Henrietta has a big habit of making things up, she has a bigger habit of making things fun, even little brothers and hamsters. So come meet Henrietta, and make an irresistible, irrepressible new friend.
author: Martine Murray
